solution_line_template: If each call lasts an hour, the total amount of money charged is {minutes_per_hour}*{cost_per_minute} = $<<{minutes_per_hour}*{cost_per_minute}={cost_per_customer}>>{cost_per_customer} for 1 customer.

When she talks to {customers_per_week} clients in a week, the total amount of money charged is {customers_per_week}*{cost_per_customer} = $<<{customers_per_week}*{cost_per_customer}={weekly_cost}>>{weekly_cost}.
In a month of {weeks_per_month} weeks, the phone bill is {weekly_cost}*{weeks_per_month} = $<<{weekly_cost}*{weeks_per_month}={monthly_cost}>>{monthly_cost}.
